sentences.en: After dinner, we sat talking on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 饭后我们坐在游廊上交谈。

sentences.en: Attached to the front of the house, there was a large veranda.
sentences.cn: 房子的正面有一条宽大的游廊。

sentences.en: He often paced up and down the veranda, muttering to himself.
sentences.cn: 他亲身给她到街上去买橘子,又托便人买了金柑来.

sentences.en: He ran along the veranda, vaulted the end.
sentences.cn: 他沿着阳台奔去, 双手一撑跳过了尽头.

sentences.en: I went with them out to the veranda.
sentences.cn: 我跟他们一起到外面游廊上去.

sentences.en: In a few minutes Norman Grange stamped along the veranda.
sentences.cn: 几分钟以后,诺尔曼·格兰奇登登地沿着游廊走了过来.

sentences.en: Kuei Chang - lin was walking to and fro on the veranda waiting.
sentences.cn: 桂长林还在游廊前徘徊.

sentences.en: She sat in the shade on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 她坐在阳台上的遮荫处.

sentences.en: The veranda was equipped with heavy wooden rain doors that were kept closed at night.
sentences.cn: 阳台装有厚重的木制防雨门，夜里是关着的。

sentences.en: Their guests sipped drinks on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 他们的客人在游廊里浅酌着美酒。

sentences.en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.en: They balanced the glasses on the rail of the veranda.
sentences.cn: 他们把酒杯小心地放在阳台的栏杆上.

sentences.en: They had their coffee and tea on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 他们在阳台上喝咖啡和茶。

sentences.en: They were strolling up and down the veranda.
sentences.cn: 他们在走廊上来回徜徉.

sentences.en: Tom could have fallen off veranda.
sentences.cn: 汤姆差一点从阳台上摔下去.

trans.tran_en: an open area with a floor and a roof that is attached to the side of a house at ground level
